About Us:
Our company Dot-Tech LLC has been in the hosting industry since late 2014. Since 2014 our focus has been providing affordable DDoS protected Game and Dedicated server hosting.
We are pleased to announce we have expanded into affordable DDoS protected KVM hosting.
